alert.note: Alert for Howard; Merrick; Nance; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 31 at 3:28PM CST until January 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. North to northeast winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 to 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to midnight CST Saturday night. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Expect areas of drifting snow. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
